cat.lump.aq.textextraction.wikipedia.categories

Class GroupOfCategories.ScoredCategory

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.aq.textextraction.wikipedia.categories.GroupOfCategories.ScoredCategory
  • Enclosing class:
    GroupOfCategories

    public static class GroupOfCategories.ScoredCategory
extends java.lang.Object

    The ScoredCategory class enriches the de.tudarmstadt.ukp.wikipedia.api.Category objects providing the following information:

    • Parent: The first category which allows access to this one.
    • Domain check: A binary classification which determines if this category belongs to the defined domain to work.
    • Distance from root category: The minimum number of edges in the categories graph needed to connect this category with its root category.

    Author:
    cmops
    See Also:
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.wikipedia.api.Category

    • Constructor Detail

      • GroupOfCategories.ScoredCategory

        public GroupOfCategories.ScoredCategory(Category cat,
                                Category parent,
                                int distance)
        Creates a scored category which hasn't already been scored. It means, the result of the isDomain() function is undefined.
        Parameters:
        cat - Category to score.
        parent - Parent of the category cat.
        distance - Distance from the root category to the category cat.

      • GroupOfCategories.ScoredCategory

        public GroupOfCategories.ScoredCategory(Category cat,
                                Category parent,
                                int distance,
                                boolean domain)
        Creates a scored category defining if its score.
        Parameters:
        cat - Category to score.
        parent - Parent of the category cat.
        distance - Distance from the root category to the category cat.
        domain - Boolean which indicates if the category cat belongs to the domain or not.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the instance. The string includes the following data seprated by tabulators:
        1. Distance from the root category.
        2. Identifier of the category page.
        3. Name of the category in Wikipedia Style (words separated by underscores).
        4. Number of articles in the category.
        5. Number of subcategories.
        6. Numeber of parents (supercategories).
        7. Identifier of the parent category nearest to the root.
        8. Boolean which defines if the category belongs to the domain.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The string representation of the instance.

      • setDomain

        public void setDomain(boolean domain)
        Sets if this category belongs to the domain.
        Parameters:
        domain - Boolean which indicates if the category cat belongs to the domain or not.

        public Category getCategory()
        Returns:
        The de.tudarmstadt.ukp.wikipedia.api.Category instance which represents the Wikipedia category.

      • getParent

        public Category getParent()
        Returns:
        The parent of this category.

      • isDomain

        public boolean isDomain()
        Returns:
        The score of the category. true if it belongs to the domain and false if it doesn't belong to it.

      • getDistance

        public int getDistance()
        Returns:
        The distance between the root category and this one.
